    • Constructor Detail

      • SVGIcon

        public SVGIcon(de.jensd.fx.glyphs.GlyphIcons icon,
               double size,
               boolean styled)
        Constructor for a SVGIcon.
        Parameters:
        icon - the Icon to be set in the backgroundIcon (can be chosen from one of the supported fonts from fontawesomefx)
        size - the size in px for the icon
        styled - true if color should be changed by theme, otherwise false

      • SVGIcon

        public SVGIcon(de.jensd.fx.glyphs.GlyphIcons backgroundIcon,
               de.jensd.fx.glyphs.GlyphIcons foregroundIcon,
               double size)
        Constructor for a SVGIcon.
        Parameters:
        backgroundIcon - the Icon to be set in the backgroundIcon (can be chosen from one of the supported fonts from fontawesomefx)
        foregroundIcon - the Icon to be set in the foregroundIcon
        size - the size in px for the icon

      • SVGIcon

        public SVGIcon(double size,
               boolean styled)

    • Method Detail

      • fadeForegroundFromTransparentToOpaque

        public void fadeForegroundFromTransparentToOpaque(int cycleCount)
        Apply and play a FadeTransition on the icon in the foregroundIcon. This Transition modifies the opacity of the foregroundIcon from fully transparent to opaque.
        Parameters:
        cycleCount - the number of times the animation should be played (use Animation.INDEFINITE for endless)

      • fadeForegroundFromOpaqueToTransparent

        public void fadeForegroundFromOpaqueToTransparent(int cycleCount)
        Apply and play a FadeTransition on the icon in the foregroundIcon. This Transition modifies the opacity of the foregroundIcon from opaque to fully transparent.
        Parameters:
        cycleCount - the number of times the animation should be played (use Animation.INDEFINITE for endless)

      • fadeBackgroundFromTransparentToOpaque

        public void fadeBackgroundFromTransparentToOpaque(int cycleCount)
        Apply and play a FadeTransition on the icon in the foregroundIcon. This Transition modifies the opacity of the foregroundIcon from fully transparent to opaque.
        Parameters:
        cycleCount - the number of times the animation should be played (use Animation.INDEFINITE for endless)

      • fadeBackgroundFromOpaqueToTransparent

        public void fadeBackgroundFromOpaqueToTransparent(int cycleCount)
        Apply and play a FadeTransition on the icon in the foregroundIcon. This Transition modifies the opacity of the foregroundIcon from opaque to fully transparent.
        Parameters:
        cycleCount - the number of times the animation should be played (use Animation.INDEFINITE for endless)

        cycleCount - the number of times the animation should be played (use Animation.INDEFINITE for endless)

        public void setForegroundIconColorAnimated(javafx.scene.paint.Color color,
                                           int cycleCount)
        Allows to set a new color to the foregroundIcon icon and setAnimation its change (by a FadeTransition).
        Parameters:
        color - the color for the foregroundIcon icon to be set
        cycleCount - the number of times the animation should be played (use Animation.INDEFINITE for endless)

        public void setForegroundIcon(de.jensd.fx.glyphs.GlyphIcons icon)
        Changes the foregroundIcon icon. Note: previous color setup and animations are reset as well.
        Parameters:
        icon - the icon which should be set as the new icon
